message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite comfortable meeting you at $9000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to meet you at $10800. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9800?

I'm getting close to your price, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9800. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me here, I'm willing to make the deal.

I appreciate your efforts to meet me in the middle, but I'm afraid $10500 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $9800, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to walk away.
